Eric, its not necessarily the fact that this child is praying to God that restores faith in humanity. Its about the selfless actions of this little boy, who chose to ask for a miracle for someone else instead of a toy for himself. Even those who don't believe in God, or have a different god can appreciate this selfless act and see it as having faith in humanity.

The US sprayed carcinogenic pesticides on California grape harvesters decades ago. The same systemic pesticide in Canada is regulated to not be applied for at least three weeks prior to harvest. The USA without warning to parents or other adults, aerial spray above pedestrians on side walks & childrens school grounds. The point is that there were some beta/developing parts of the game that have been shown, based on which the further development phase would be built, depending on the funding. This is such a misleading article. I'm not even into games, but find this highly offensive from an accurate truth point of view. I do hope the title is meant to be read as a sign of hope, people pay that money because they probably want to see the game be made. How can you expect a fully functional game of that size before putting in considerable amounts of money? Just think of the latest GTA with a 1/4 of a billion funding. Have some faith in creativity .

In Pharoahs day, both the Arabs and the Jews were Black Africans. There were never any white people enslaved in Egypt. But there were Black slaves in Egypt. Had there been whites enslaved in Egypt for 400 years, they would have surely documented it. How is it Egyptians documented black slaves; but never showed any white slaves. Because the Israelite slaves of Egypt were themselves Egyptians and Ethiopians and Nubians.
